Question: This person also irritated sponsors and tennis officials by shunning the end-of-year Masters championship from 1974 through 1976.
Hints: This person won eight Grand Slam singles championships: five US Opens, two Wimbledons, and one Australian Open.
This person won all three meetings with Rod Laver in tour events.
This person won three year-end championship titles, including two WCT Finals and one Masters Grand Prix.
